xml.head: HEADER A short blurb about Toronto and London Ontario.
xml.body:
BODY Toronto Ontario Canada is east of London Ontario. It is otherwise known as Ol'Smokey. But in short just Toronto.
This is a sentence with Toronto in the middle.
Naheed Nenshi is the mayor of Calgary. John Tory is the mayor of Toronto.
xml.tail: TAIL There is nothing here about Toronto or London.
